actor.name: Shia LaBeouf
actor.biography: Shia Saide LaBeouf was born June 11, 1986 in Los Angeles, California, to Shayna (Saide) and Jeffrey LaBeouf, and is an only child.

actor.name: Bryan Cranston
actor.biography: Bryan Lee Cranston is an American actor, voice actor, writer and director. He is perhaps best-known for his roles as "Walter White" on the AMC drama series, Breaking Bad (2008).

actor.name: Seth Rogen
actor.biography: Rogen was born in Vancouver, British Columbia, to Mark and Sandy Rogen.

actor.name: Andrew Garfield
actor.biography: Andrew Russell Garfield was born in Los Angeles, California, to a British-born mother, Lynn (Hillman), and an American-born father, Richard Garfield.
